analysis: The project is a test website focused on black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The existing files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for creating an interactive and animated presentation about black holes. The CSS file is intended to have a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon. The JavaScript file has syntax errors that need fixing and requires completion for proper functionality.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS with additional animations for black hole visuals, such as gravitational lensing effects, event horizon animations, and swirling accretion disk effects. Add glowing elements to simulate the intense light around black holes.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and styling.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html.
